  • Method Details

    • closeButtonAction

      public void closeButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method is called when the "close" button is pressed in the UI. It loads the "manager.fxml" file and sets up the connection and menu for the controller. Then, it creates a new scene using the root, and sets the scene to be displayed in the current stage.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "close" button press
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error loading the "manager.fxml" file

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException, IOException
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • addSalesReport

      public void addSalesReport(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Adds a new sales report to the database. Calculates profits and taxes based on the total sales for the given date. Loads updated sales data into the table view.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query
      IOException - if there is an error with the input/output operations

    • addXReport

      public void addXReport(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method is responsible for adding a new report to the X Table
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggers the report generation
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown when there is a database error
      IOException - Thrown when there is an input or output error

    • getTotalDaySales

      public double getTotalDaySales(String day) throws SQLException, IOException
      Calculates the total sales for a given day by summing the price of all orders made on that day.
      Parameters:
      day - the date for which to calculate the total sales (in the format "yyyy-MM-dd")
      Returns:
      the total sales for the given day
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query
      IOException - if there is an error with the input/output operations

    • loadItems

      public void loadItems(String start, String end) throws SQLException
      Loads the items sold within a specified time period and displays them in a table view. The method queries the database for the count of each menu item sold within the specified time period and groups them by item name, meal type, and size. The result is then displayed in a table view.
      Parameters:
      start - the start date of the time period to be considered
      end - the end date of the time period to be considered
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there is an error executing the SQL query
